1141.content:
I was waiting in my room for Amber to come over. Amber was one of the smartest girls I'd ever met; at 21, she was already in the pre-doctorate program in experimental physics, after graduating magna cum laude in only two years.

Yeah, she's smarter than me, but hey, she's MY girlfriend, so I'm happy about it.

I heard the doorbell ring, and heard Lana answer the door. Moments later, my room door opened, and in walked both Amber and Lana, and I went to give Amber a kiss. Amber was carrying what looked like a briefcase, which I had not seen before.

"So," I said, what's the 'cool new toy' you wanted to show me?"

"Well..." she said, and looked straight at Lana. "Lana, can you keep a secret, and if so, are you willing to get a little weirded out having fun with it?"

Privately, I didn't think it was a good idea, but Amber and Lana were friends, and Lana enthusiastically agreed.

"OK then," said Amber, and opened up the briefcase; most of the briefcase was taken up by what looked like a very fancy piece of electronics, and on the left there were slots for eight of what looked like wristwatches. The first slot was empty, and I could see that Amber was wearing one of the devices, but on her right wrist; her Apple Watch was, as usual, on her left.

"Here we go, then," she said. "I'm going to show you what this can do, and then you'll get a chance to try it, hopefully in a lot of fun combinations. Lana, please close and lock the door."

As Lana went over to the door, Amber tapped on the new wristwatch. A glow seemed to surround her body, and she shrank. She disappeared inside her clothes, as a tiny giggle came from within them.

"What the..." Lana had turned around after Amber had shrunk, so all she saw was the apparently-unoccupied clothes on the chair she had been sitting in. "What did you do with her, Alex?" she said, almost frantic.

"I didn't do anything!" I said.

"That's right," came a small, slightly higher-pitched voice from behind me, and I saw Amber, apparently about 6 inches tall, emerge from the neck of her blouse, seemingly having no qualms about her state of undressedness.

"WOW!" said Lana, immediately getting it. "Those wristwatch things let you shrink?"

"And grow, too," said Amber, tapping the miniature wristwatch again. In only about 5 seconds, she was back to her full size, but this time sitting on top of her clothes.

"So that's the secret," said full-size, naked Amber, "and we can have some fun, because there's a band here for each of you." She grabbed the band from the #2 slot and put it around my right wrist, and put the #3 band around Lana's.

"Now here's where the fun begins," said Amber, tapping her band again.

Both Lana and I began to glow, and we shrank.

info.brief_description: Play as Alexander or Lilith and decide where the story goes.
info.description:
Introduction by the creator
Hi my name is Tommy. You might know me, you might not. I have created this new shrinking story to add to the big pile we already have. Hoping that I can call it “Best Giantess / Shrinking Interactive” one day. And I was thinking you could help me with that.


Information about the story
The story takes place in a modern day setting. Your character is 18 years old and your first choice will be whether you’re boy or a girl. As a boy you will shrink, as a girl you will get the choice to be shrunken or shrink others. The reason for this is because I would like to keep male giants out of the story. (I can set up a different story for those if you really want me to - pm me)


Important Rules:
- No Male giants!
- Make death avoidable! (Unlike others I highly support death chapters, but always make sure the story doesn’t run into a dead end.)
- At least 2 choices in every chapter! (Unless it’s an ending)

(Chapters breaking these rules will be deleted!)


Less Important Rules:
- Keep the toilet content to a minimum.
- I don't mind short chapters.
- Please give a fun title to the chapter you add.
- No “Reader’s Choice” … Please It’s like a blindfold.
- Don’t go too far with children and keep the minimum age around 13.
- Don’t do weird, random, nothing to do with the subject stuff…
- Write in present time.
- Please don't make shrunken people taller than 3 Inches.

(These are guidelines, if you don’t follow these your chapters might be edited.)


Don't forget to rate & favorite! :)
